attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this is a petition for peoples right to smoke in pubs as i think its taking away our civil rights.we should have the right to choose how we want to live our lives not the way this government tell us.i thought this was a democratic country not a communist one!!& by the way i am a non smoker & any non smokers who dont like smokey pubs then DONT go in there simple as that!!and if its for health reasons... your in a pub drinkin alcohol that doesnt make sense to me!!come on england lets make a stand for once dont be pushed over & carry on smokin everwhere.wat they gonna do put us all in jail

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
